content:
Drug: Temazepam | cid: 5391
Source: erowid | Source description: Information about Temazepam (Restoril) including uses, images, dosage, effects, legal status, and links to other resources.
Erowid name: temazepam
Category: PHARMS
Field: MainPage

                    Text: 
                    Temazepam



COMMON & BRAND NAMES

Restoril

EFFECTS CLASSIFICATION

Anxiolytic; Sedative; Benzodiazepine

CHEMICAL NAME

7-chloro-1,3-dihydro-3-hydroxy-1-methyl-5-phenyl-2H- 1,4-benzodiazepin-2-one

DESCRIPTION

Temazepam is a benzodiazepine used in the short-term treatment of insomnia and anxiety.

BASICS

EFFECTS

IMAGES

HEALTH

LAW

DOSE

CHEMISTRY

RELATED VAULTS #

Benzodiazepines

EXPERIENCES #

How I Became A Closet Drug Addict, by Ashamed Idiot

Experience With Pheds, by Virter

Nowhere but Sickness and Bad Dreams, by trunkbot310000

Can Be Different, by Anonymous

» » » MORE » » »

                    This excerpt provides detailed information on temazepam, a benzodiazepine used for insomnia and anxiety treatment, including its common names, effects, chemical name, and related resources.
